The TabNav is a wrapper container for building second level tabbed-navigation bars

### Example

```jsx live=true
<TabNav
	backButton={{
		text: "text",
		href: "/href",
		clickHandler: () => {}
	}}
>
	<TabNavItem>Crossover/Wagon</TabNavItem>
	<TabNavItem isActive>SUV</TabNavItem>
	<TabNavItem>Sedan</TabNavItem>
</TabNav>
```

### With Line Transition

```jsx live=true
() => {
	const [active, setActive] = React.useState(1);
	return (
		<TabNav enableLineTransition>
			<TabNavItem
				isActive={active === 1}
				onClick={() => {
					setActive(1);
				}}
			>
				Crossover/Wagon
			</TabNavItem>
			<TabNavItem
				isActive={active === 2}
				onClick={() => {
					setActive(2);
				}}
			>
				SUV
			</TabNavItem>
			<TabNavItem
				isActive={active === 3}
				onClick={() => {
					setActive(3);
				}}
			>
				Sedan
			</TabNavItem>
		</TabNav>
	);
};
```

### Changelog

- _Added in version 0.0.45_
